entity.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this entity? This action cannot be undone.

create_entity.title: Create Entity
create_entity.description: Create a new entity in the knowledge graph. The slug is a unique identifier for this entity.

edit_entity.title: Edit Entity
edit_entity.description: Update the entity information. The slug is the unique identifier for this entity.

source.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this source? This will also delete all relations associated with it. This action cannot be undone.

create_source.title: Create Source
create_source.description: Create a new source for the knowledge graph. Sources are references that provide the foundation for relations and claims.
create_source.url_help: Link to the source document or webpage

edit_source.title: Edit Source
edit_source.description: Update the source information. Sources provide the foundation for relations and claims.

relation.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this relation? This action cannot be undone.

relations.title: Relations
relations.view_by_source: Relations are currently organized by source. To view relations, please visit the Sources page and select a source.
relations.explanation: Relations in this system are tied to sources. Each relation must come from a specific source, ensuring traceability and trust.

edit_relation.title: Edit Relation
edit_relation.description: Update the relation details. Note that the source cannot be changed.

change_password.title: Change Password
change_password.description: Enter your current password and choose a new password. Your new password must be at least 8 characters long.
change_password.password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters

settings.title: Settings
settings.email_help: You may need to verify your new email address
settings.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
settings.deactivate_warning: Temporarily disable your account without deleting your data. You can reactivate it later by logging in again.
settings.deactivate_confirmation: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? Your account will be temporarily disabled, but you can reactivate it by logging in again. Your data will be preserved.
settings.delete_warning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. This action is permanent and will remove all your data.
settings.delete_confirmation: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and all your data will be permanently removed.

explanation.title: Inference Explanation
explanation.high_disagreement: High disagreement detected - sources significantly contradict each other
explanation.contradictions_note: The sources below show opposing evidence. Review them carefully to understand the full picture.
explanation.source_evidence_desc: Click on any source to view its full details

filters.title: Filters
filters.no_results: No items match the current filters
